text: Dalibor Motejlek (born 17 April 1942) is a former Czechoslovakian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==Ski jumping world record== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left; line-height:16px; width:45%;" !style="background- color: #ccc;" width="100"|Date !style="background-color: #ccc;" width="180"|Hill !style="background-color: #ccc;" width="185"|Location !style="background-color: #ccc;" width="50"|Metres !style="background-color: #ccc;" width="50"|Feet |- | align=right|15 February 1964 | Heini-Klopfer- Skiflugschanze | Oberstdorf, West Germany | align=center|142 | align=center|466 |} ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Czechoslovakia Category:Ski jumpers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:People from Vysoké nad Jizerou
title: Dalibor Motejlek
